original_text: Then came Jeremiah from Tophet, whither the Lord had sent him to prophesy; and he stood in the court of the Lord's house; and said to all the people,
korean_text: 예레미야가 여호와께서 자기를 보내사 예언하게 하신 도벳에서 돌아와 여호와의 집 뜰에 서서 모든 백성에게 말하되

sentences.original_text: whither the Lord had sent him to prophesy
and he stood in the court of the Lord's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 주의 집 뜰에 섰고

sentences.original_text: and said to all the people
